mil3.3.9:2.2_3: so tena adhikārena pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgibhūto paricareyya,
mil3.3.9:2.2_4: tassa evamassa ‘mayā kho pubbe rañño adhikāro kato,
mil3.3.9:2.2_5: tassa me rājā tuṭṭho adhikāraṁ adāsi,
mil3.3.9:2.2_6: svāhaṁ tatonidānaṁ imaṁ evarūpaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti.
mil3.3.9:3.1_1: kocideva puriso kusalaṁ kammaṁ katvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjeyya,
mil3.3.9:3.1_2: so ca tattha dibbehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgibhūto paricareyya,
mil3.3.9:3.1_3: tassa evamassa ‘svāhaṁ kho pubbe kusalaṁ kammaṁ akāsiṁ,
mil3.3.9:3.1_4: sohaṁ tatonidānaṁ imaṁ evarūpaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti.
